Package geometries

Class RadialGeometry

java.lang.Object
geometries.RadialGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Geometry, Intersectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sphere, Tube
public abstract class RadialGeometry extends Object implements Geometry
The abstract class RadialGeometry implements the determination of a rounded shape radius and more things down the road.
